content.content: 美國在 2010 年有 423,000 名病人（60 歲以上）因血栓 (VTE) 而住院。[^106] 當血球聚集在一起並改變靜脈內的血流時，就形成了血栓。[^107][^108][^109] ![Blood clot](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/2npwuuP9WsAoYokYS0awas/788e1805ba3cb7a3dfeffa7c348fa895/Blood_clot.jpg) 症狀：:[^107][^108][^109] - 疼痛 - 腫脹 - 變色（藍色或紅色） - 發熱 ![DVT Stock](//images.ctfassets.net/xbvvg00rroa3/1RK4SMzNEwWAuW6OCwMsE2/2f3bd29aee31e0a9f1ba72f5cf823014/DVT_Stock.jpg) Embedded content: https://youtu.be/cLbncqbBYg0?list=LL31GglpqkW9B1NW8eHUZ-CA [ 嵌入內容：](http://www.choosingwisely.org/patient-resources/acute-blood-clots/) ## 肺栓塞 (PE) 肺栓塞（肺部血栓）指的是血栓（靜脈血栓栓塞）漂流到肺部。[^107][^108][^109] Embedded content: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QnovOItwJKg&index=2&list=LL31GglpqkW9B1NW8eHUZ-CA 症狀:[^107][^108][^109][^111] - 呼吸困難 - 胸痛 - 無法解釋的咳嗽 - 無法解釋的心跳速率加快。 ## 預防血栓 Embedded content: https://youtu.be/vNArtKdLPC8 1. 詢問您的醫師和護理師：「會做哪些事來預防血栓？」[^107][^108][^109][^111][^112] 2. 詢問您或病人是否會使用抗凝血劑。[^107][^108][^109][^111][^112] 3. 確保病人的彈性襪和壓力靴（循環加壓設備）在病人臥床或坐在椅子上時已插電且運作中。[^7][^10] 4. 只有走路是不足以預防血栓的。[^107][^108] 5. 只使用阿斯匹靈無法預防血栓。[^113] [美國國家血栓聯盟提供的血栓資訊](https://www.stoptheclot.org/spreadtheword/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/NBCA-Infographic.pdf) [美國國家醫學圖書館提供的深層靜脈血栓資訊](https://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/deepveinthrombosis.html) [世界血栓日提供的 VTE 資訊](http://www.worldthrombosisday.org/issue/vte/) [^7]: Hallisey J. The Empowered Patient® hospital guide for patients and families. Empowered Patient website. http://engagedpatients.org/wp-content/uploads/2014/06/empowered_patient_hospital_guide.pdf. Published 2009. Updated 2012. Accessed May 10, 2015. [^10]: Curtiss K. Campaign. ZERO-Patient Safety Checklist. http://patientsafetymovement.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/Resources_Checklist_Patient_Safety_Checklist_Collection.pdf. Accessed November 5, 2015. [^106]: Yusuf HR, Reyes N, Zhang QC, Okoroh EM, Siddiqi AEA, Tsai J. Hospitalizations of adults >60 years of age with venous thromboembolism. Clin Appl Thromb Hemost. 2014 Mar;20(2):136-142. doi: 10.1177/1076029613493659. Epub 2013 Jun 27. [^107]: University of North Carolina Blood Clot Outreach Program. For Patient. Clot Connect® website. http://www.clotconnect.org/patients. Published September 2010. Accessed May 8, 2015. [^108]: Streiff MB, Brady PJ, Grant AM, Grosse SD, Wong B, Popovic T. CDC Grand Rounds: Preventing hospital-associated venous thromboembolism. MMWR Morb and Mortal Wkly Rep. 2014;63(9):190-3. [^109]: AHRQ Effective Health Care Program. Preventing blood clots after hip or knee replacement surgery or surgery for a broken hip. DHHS Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality. http://effectivehealthcare.ahrq.gov/ehc/products/186/1144/vte_ortho_surg_cons_fin_to_post.pdf. AHRQ Pub. No. 12-EHCO20-A. 28.
